data.what_is: Alpine IQ empowers high-risk industries by providing customer-focused technology to help retailers and brands of all sizes resolve growth challenges and generate revenue. The company provides customers with the industry's most extensive suite of tools to protect, segment, and promote all in-store and online operations.
data.product_description: Alpine IQ empowers the legal cannabis industry by providing customer-focused technology to help retailers of all sizes resolve growth challenges and generate revenue. Alpine IQ provides customers with the industry's most extensive suite of tools to protect, segment, and promote all in-store and online operations.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Team and Even Better Service!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alpine IQ?
One of the many things that I like is how frequently updates are made and representatives are always in contact with you regarding anything new. I've used AlpineIQ with two different companies and the platofrm has only gotten better.

What do you dislike about Alpine IQ?
It would be awesome to have the ability to have playable video option for emails that didn't direct it to a different location. I'm sure it will be available in the near future, we're very hopeful!

What problems is Alpine IQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
I don't currently have any problems and am really enjoyed the user friendly aspect of the program.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Alpine IQ?
review_question_answers.answer: One of the many things that I like is how frequently updates are made and representatives are always in contact with you regarding anything new. I've used AlpineIQ with two different companies and the platofrm has only gotten better.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Alpine IQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I don't currently have any problems and am really enjoyed the user friendly aspect of the program.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alpine IQ?
With the Premium accounts you're able to have access to an account manager that will help with any issues. They will meet with you and eductate you on all of the new features and even help when you're stuck on old features. They're always pleasant, kind, and filled with knowledge.

What do you dislike about Alpine IQ?
Sometimes it's hard to know everything because the platform is capiable of so much!

What problems is Alpine IQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has allowed us to connect with our customers more seamlessly

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alpine IQ?
As the Marketing Director for my company, Alpine has been a game changer. We've increased our retial sales and have been able to connect with our consumers in a more personable way.

What do you dislike about Alpine IQ?
There is not anything  that stand outs to me that I don't like.

What problems is Alpine IQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is showing direct ROi

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alpine IQ?
Their services help for extract insights from their data, which can lead to better decision-making, improved efficiency, and increased revenue. Some of the things that businesses may appreciate about Alpine IQ's data analysis services could be the accuracy and reliability of their data, the comprehensiveness of their analysis, or the speed and responsiveness of their service.

What do you dislike about Alpine IQ?
Not dislike for my side using for this services.

What problems is Alpine IQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have solved Data integration and Data analysis services on our campaign, which can improve our efficiency, increase revenue, and competitive advantage with a fast dashboard with functionality...
